thread.title: Devart Announced the First Release of dbForge Data Generator for MySQL
thread.title_full: Devart Announced the First Release of dbForge Data Generator for MySQL - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Devart Announced the First Release of dbForge Data Generator for MySQL
text:
Devart Announced the First Release of dbForge Data Generator for MySQL
Devart announced a brand-new GUI tool for creating massive volumes of realistic test data - dbForge Data Generator for MySQL.
Prague, Czech Republic, September 03, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Devart, Czech software vendor, presented a first version of a brand-new product â€“ dbForge Data Generator for MySQL. This GUI tool provides creating massive volumes of realistic test data for MySQL database. It includes a large collection of predefined data generators with customizable configuration options that enables populating MySQL database tables with meaningful data of various types. dbForge Data Generator for MySQL supports all essential column data types, including:
- Integer, Decimal, Numeric, Float
- Time, Date, Datetime, Year
- Char, Varchar, Binary, Varbinary, Blob, Text
The collection of basic generators enables populating MySQL tables with various types of values:
- Regular Expression
- Weighted Lists, SQL Query
- Table or View
- Text File, Files Folder
- Shuffled Text
- Lorem Ipsum
Additionally, the first release contains more than 180 meaningful data generators, including IDs, post codes, phone numbers, e-mails and other.
The tool also supports foreign key for generation of consistent data across multiple tables. It provides disabling triggers and constraints to avoid interference with database logic.
dbForge Data Generator for MySQL supports MySQL versions 3.23-5.x, Percona Server and MariaDB.
To learn more about dbForge Data Generator for MySQL visit http://www.devart.com/dbforge/mysql/data-generator/.
About Devart
Devart is a recognized vendor of database connectivity solutions for Microsoft .NET and Embarcadero Delphi development platforms as well as database development and management software.
Company's solutions support such databases as Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, PostgreSQL, InterBase, Firebird, DB2, SQLite, etc.
Along with database oriented software Devart offers productivity tools for Visual Studio which help developers to be empowered, stay focused, and deliver their best all the time.
